Text: Just to clarify things this is a Serbian language film with English subtitles and is the full uncensored, uncut version.

Hello roaduck, I would most definitely like to get an NTSC version of this DVD. When i try to play this PAL version It displays tiny green digital dots throughout the film. Let me know if you can release the NTSC version, and thank you for your time!
